gui.bed_fail.message: Uh oh, what if the oxygen runs out when I am asleep?  I'll need a Cryogenic Chamber to sleep in space!
gui.chest.warning.wrongkey: I'll probably need a Tier %s Dungeon key to unlock this!
gui.crafting_memory.desc.0: This Magnetic Crafting Table can craft more of this!
gui.crafting_memory.desc.1: To remember a recipe, craft one item.

gui.message.help1a: To see this message again at any time, type

gui.missing_core.name.3: Click here to open download page

gui.rocket.warning.fuelinsufficient: Not enough fuel for a safe launch under automatic control!
gui.rocket.warning.launchcontroller: Pre-flight cancelling launch.  Check the Launch Controller!
gui.rocket.warning.nofuel: I'll need to load in some rocket fuel first!
gui.rocket.warning.nogyroscope: Mysterious forces are at play and the gyroscopes are spinning wildly!
gui.rocket.warning.noparachute: I don't have a parachute! If I press launch again, there's no going back!
gui.skeleton_boss.message: Boss despawned, don't leave the boss room while fighting! Re-enter room to respawn boss.
gui.space_race.chat.already_part: You are already a part of this space race!
gui.space_race.chat.invite_received: Received Space Race Team Invite from %s.

gui.space_race.join.title: Join Space Race
gui.spacestation.added: You've been added to %s's Space Station accepted players!
gui.spacestation.addsuccess: Successfully added %s to Space Station list!
gui.spacestation.allow_all_false: Your Space Stations are no longer open to all players!
gui.spacestation.allow_all_true: Your Space Stations are now open to all players!  (Use /ssinvite -all to undo this.)
gui.spacestation.changesuccess: Changed Space Station owner from %s to new owner %s.
gui.spacestation.removesuccess: Successfully removed %s from Space Station list
gui.spacestation.to_allow_entry: to allow another player to enter this space station!
gui.telemetry_fail.message: First I'll need to track an entity with that Frequency Module! (Or try wearing it!)
gui.telemetry_fail_no_frequency_module.m: I'll probably need a Frequency Module in my hand to make use of this!
gui.telemetry_fail_wearing_it.message: I'll need to take off my Frequency Module if I want to link it with this Telemetry Unit!
gui.tracking.message: Tracking activated. Now I'll need to right-click this on a Telemetry Unit to complete the link.
gui.village.warning.no_freq_mod: I'll need to equip a Frequency Module to communicate with them!
item.galacticraftcore.emergency_kit.desc: Right click to equip Oxygen Gear and other essential items. Warning: One time use!
item.galacticraftcore.cheeseburger.desc: Astronauts love cheeseburgers! A very satisfying food.
item.galacticraftcore.lunar_sapphire.des: Lunar Sapphires are the unit of currency when trading with Alien Villagers
jei.arc_lamp.info: Very bright light in the facing direction. Place high up for best effect! Rotate using Standard Wrench.
jei.electric_compressor.info: Electric version of the Ingot Compressor, twice as fast! Even faster with Tier 2 power. A Hopper can fill or empty this machine.
jei.electric_compressor.appeng.info: For automation with AE2, set up your recipes with ingots from 2 different mods. See https:goo.gl/BwY15G for full info.
jei.fluid_pipe.info: Pipe for transporting any liquid or gas. To pump fluid out of a tank, click with a Standard Wrench to convert to 'pull mode'. \nPipe in pull mode cannot fill a tank or machine - so make your pipe runs at least 2 blocks long!
jei.fuel_loader.info: Place next to a Rocket Launch Pad. Refuels any rocket positioned on the pad. Essential for any journey into space - including your journey home again!
jei.magnetic_crafting.info: A Crafting Table which holds its items. Can accept items from a Hopper to auto-craft the last recipe successfully crafted.
jei.oxygen_collector.info: Collects breathable oxygen mixture from the Overworld or - in space - from nearby green leaves or growing crops. \nPipe the oxygen to Oxygen Compressor for oxygen tanks, or Oxygen Bubble Distributor or Oxygen Sealer.
jei.oxygen_distributor.info: Creates a bubble environment in space where players (and other creatures) can breath. Supply this with breathable oxygen mixture from Oxygen Collector or Oxygen Storage Module.
jei.oxygen_sealer.info: Fills 1 room in your space base with a breathable atmosphere. Supply this with breathable oxygen mixture from Oxygen Collector or Oxygen Storage Module. All walls of the room must be solid. \nFind leaks using Sensor Glasses! \nMaximum room size for 1 Oxygen Sealer is 10x10x8 blocks. Use multiple Oxygen Sealers for larger rooms!
jei.wrench.info: Most Galacticraft machines can be rotated by right-clicking with the Standard Wrench. \nMost electrical machines can change their power and other input and output sides using this and Shift-clicking.
newversion.failed: Galacticraft update check failed! Trying again in 15 seconds
block.galacticraftcore.air_lock_frame.de: Air Lock Frames, when arranged in a portal-like formation, with a single block replaced with a controller, will function as a working air lock.
block.galacticraftcore.aluminum_wire.des: Aluminum Wire is used to connect energy sources to energy consuming machines.
block.galacticraftcore.aluminum_wire_hea: Heavy Aluminum Wire is used to connect energy sources to energy consuming machines. Its higher capacity boosts efficiency for Tier 2 machines.
block.galacticraftcore.aluminum_wire_swi: Switchable Aluminum Wire connects like Aluminum Wire, unless switched OFF with a redstone signal.
Switchable Heavy Aluminum Wire connects like Heavy Aluminum Wire, unless switched OFF with a redstone signal.
block.galacticraftcore.arclamp.descripti: Arc Lamps are used to provide strong light to a large area, also causing most mobs to flee.
block.galacticraftcore.buggy_pad.descrip: Fueling Pads will allow a buggy on the pad to be refueled by an attached Fuel Loaders if set up in a 3x3 square.  Cannot be used to launch rockets!
block.galacticraftcore.cargo_loader.desc: Cargo Loaders will pass blocks and items onto Rockets and other vehicles with cargo space. Must be attached to Landing/Fueling pad.
block.galacticraftcore.cargo_unloader.de: Cargo Unloaders will extract blocks and items from Rockets and other vehicles with cargo space. Must be attached to Landing/Fueling pad.
block.galacticraftcore.cheese.descriptio: Cheese Blocks are created from the cheeses of the Moon, place-able and edible.
block.galacticraftcore.circuit_fabricato: Circuit Fabricator will process basic materials into silicon wafers, used for advanced machines.
block.galacticraftcore.coal_generator.de: Coal Generator will burn coal (or a Block of Coal) for energy. The simplest but least efficient energy production method.
block.galacticraftcore.collector.descrip: Oxygen Collector will store oxygen collected from leaves in the surrounding area.
Compressor will process ingots into their compressed equivalents. The most essential machine in Galacticraft!
block.galacticraftcore.ingot_compressor_: Electric Compressor will process ingots into their compressed equivalents. Compresses two at a time, making it more effective than its predecessor.
A faster version of the Electric Compressor.  Rapidly processes ingots into their compressed equivalents.
block.galacticraftcore.deconstructor.des: The Deconstructor will take apart your old rockets and other items, returning any salvageable materials.
block.galacticraftcore.dishbase.descript: The Communications Dish can track the position of space stations and receive communications from your remote space bases.
block.galacticraftcore.distributor.descr: Oxygen Distributor will emit an oxygen bubble outwards from the center block, using internal tank. This allows safe breathing inside the bubble.
Electric Furnace is used as a faster alternative to traditional coal furnaces.
block.galacticraftcore.furnace_arc.descr: Electric Arc Furnace is used as a better and faster alternative to both traditional coal and electric furnaces: double output from ores!
block.galacticraftcore.emergency_box.des: Place an Emergency Post close by your first landing place on a planet. Open to find Emergency Kit inside. Also repels mobs!
block.galacticraftcore.enclosed.descript: Sealable blocks should be used where air cannot pass, such as space base walls.
block.galacticraftcore.energy_storage.de: Energy Storage Module is used to store large amounts of energy for later use.
block.galacticraftcore.energy_cluster.de: Energy Storage Cluster is used to store large amounts of energy for later use. Stores and outputs more energy than its predecessor.
block.galacticraftcore.fallen_meteor.des: Fallen Meteors can be found in many planets/moons which have little or no atmosphere. Will drop Meteoric Iron when broken.
block.galacticraftcore.fluid_pipe.descri: Fluid Pipe will transfer liquid and gas from source to destination block. Use a Standard Wrench to switch modes.
block.galacticraftcore.fluid_pipe_pull.d: Fluid Pipe will transfer liquid and gas from source to destination block. Use a Standard Wrench to switch modes.
block.galacticraftcore.fluid_tank.descri: Fluid Tanks will store liquids and gases for later use.
block.galacticraftcore.fuel_loader.descr: After being connected to a launch pad, a Fuel Loader will allow fuel to passed into the connected Rocket or other vehicle.
block.galacticraftcore.glowstone_torch.d: Glowstone Torches are best used to light areas when there is no oxygen for wood torches to burn.
block.galacticraftcore.landing_pad.descr: Launch Pads will allow placement of Rockets if set up in a 3x3 square. Fuel Loaders, Cargo Loaders, and Launch Controllers can be attached.
block.galacticraftcore.magnetic_table.de: Items placed won't fall off - it holds its inventory! Can shift-click items in. Hoppers can insert and remove items, it will attempt to automatically create the last recipe crafted.
block.galacticraftcore.oxygen_compressor: Oxygen Compressor will load oxygen from internal storage into an oxygen tank.
block.galacticraftcore.oxygen_decompress: Oxygen Decompressor will unload oxygen into internal storage from an oxygen tank.
block.galacticraftcore.oxygen_detector.d: Oxygen Detector will emit a redstone signal when surrounded by oxygen.
block.galacticraftcore.oxygen_storage_mo: Oxygen Storage Module is used to store large amounts of oxygen for later use.
block.galacticraftcore.painter.descripti: Applies color to Vacuum Glass, Lighting Panels or other paintable objects. Use any block - or dye - to provide a fresh color!
block.galacticraftcore.panel_lighting.de: Lighting panel for use in space! Wrench rotates it. To change the look: hold SNEAK while placing this against the chosen block.
block.galacticraftcore.parachest.descrip: Parachests will fall from the sky after landing on certain planets/moons, such as Earth. Contains rocket, fuel, and cargo from previous launch.
block.galacticraftcore.platform.descript: Place 4 to form a platform. The platform lifts players to the next platform above or below. SNEAK = down : JUMP = up.
block.galacticraftcore.refinery.descript: Refinery will take an input of oil and energy, and output fuel used for rockets and vehicles.
The NASA Workbench is used to create many advanced parts and vehicles. New schematics can be added as they are found.
block.galacticraftcore.sealer.descriptio: Oxygen Sealer will check for an enclosed space. If the space is enclosed, it will fill with breathable air.
block.galacticraftcore.solar_advanced.de: Advanced Solar Panels will collect energy from the sun, storing it for further use. Automatically adjusts panel angle for optimal energy collection.
block.galacticraftcore.solar.description: Basic Solar Panels will collect energy from the sun, storing it for further use. Collects most energy at mid-day (non-adjustable).
block.galacticraftcore.space_glass.descr: Vacuum sealed glass for your space bases. Paint the surround any color using a nearby Chromatic Applicator!
block.galacticraftcore.space_glass.clear: Clear glass for great views of space, can also provide a clear view underwater.
block.galacticraftcore.space_glass.stron: Strong and explosion-resistant glass. Made from Transparent Aluminum...
block.galacticraftcore.spin_thruster.des: Spin Thrusters are used to make space stations rotate.
block.galacticraftcore.telemetry.descrip: This gathers useful data from linked rockets, players and mobs. Best placed near to a Display Screen. Use a Frequency Module to establish data links.
block.galacticraftcore.treasure_chest.de: Tier 1 Treasure Chests will generate in Moon Dungeons. They are unlockable after defeating the final boss.
block.galacticraftcore.view_screen.descr: Display screens add that final touch to your space base. Right-click changes the information shown.
advancement.galacticraft.root.title: Galacticraft
advancement.galacticraft.circuit_fabrica: Craft a circuit fabricator to make wafers
advancement.galacticraft.basic_wafer.des: Craft a basic wafer. (It's silicon so please don't eat it!)
Craft an advanced wafer. (You still can't eat it!)
advancement.galacticraft.solar.title: Free Energy
advancement.galacticraft.oil.title: Sticky stuff
advancement.galacticraft.refiery.title: Time to Refine!
advancement.galacticraft.fill_tank.title: Air 2 Go
Fill up every kind of oxygen tank
advancement.galacticraft.all_oxygen_gear: Create everything you need to breath in space
advancement.galacticraft.rocket_t1.title: We have a Rocket!
advancement.galacticraft.moon.title: The Moon!
advancement.galacticraft.moon_dungeon.de: Find an evolved skeleton boss in a dungeon
advancement.galacticraft.dungeon_key_moo: Kill the boss hiding in the dungeon, and steal it's key
